statements: UPDATE order_fulfillment SET order_status='Shipped', fulfillment_type='Standard' WHERE order_id=101

UPDATE order_fulfillment SET order_status = 'SHIPPED', fulfillment_type = 'Standard' WHERE order_id = 101 AND customer_id = 201 AND product_id = 301;
